title: Sudden, sustained high ping
body:
San Antonio, TX
Grande Communications internet
It was fine last night.  Logged in today around 2pm, and since then it's been an issue.  Normally I have very low ping, and now it's a sustained 150-200.

replies.body:
Let's do some quick troubleshooting to see if we can track down exactly why that ping jumped up so quickly overnight. 

Open up your network settings and check your port forwarding and DNS really quickly using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as an aid. Make sure you go over the steps to update port forwarding and flush your DNS, but do the other steps as well just as a precaution. 

Test these changes in a custom/practice game and let me know if it helps or not.

I logged in this morning and the issue appears to have resolved itself, without me doing any troubleshooting.  Thanks for the help though.

Makes me wonder why I randomly had a laggy day on League and only League though.
It was most likely a hiccup with your connection if it only happened that day. It's not uncommon for ISP's to perform regular maintenance which could affect connections to groups of servers.
I am having the exact same issue and so is my friend
